links: Filippo Disanto, The size of the biggest Caterpillar subtree in binary rooted planar trees, arXiv preprint arXiv:1202.5668, 2012. See the sequence F-(3).
maple: For a Maple program see A214198.
mathematica: nmax = 30; aa = ConstantArray[0,nmax]; aa[[1]] = 1; aa[[2]] = 1; aa[[3]] = 2; aa[[4]] = 1; Do[aa[[n]] = Sum[aa[[k]]*aa[[n-k]],{k,1,n-1}],{n,5,nmax}]; aa (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 25 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
